Requirement: Graph query response time < 2 seconds for 90th percentile
Acceptance Criteria: Load test showing p90 < 2s for standard queries

Requirement: Knowledge graph must support 50M+ nodes and 200M+ relationships
Acceptance Criteria: Stress test with 50M nodes demonstrating functionality
LLM response time benchmarks with KAG-Solver

Requirement: System must support 50+ concurrent consultants across clients
Acceptance Criteria: K6 load test with 50 concurrent users maintaining <3s response

Requirement: Agent Zero must handle 10+ parallel pentest simulations
Acceptance Criteria: 10 Agent Zero instances running concurrent attack simulations

Requirement: Data isolation enforced at database and application layers
Acceptance Criteria: Security audit confirms no cross-tenant data leakage

Requirement: Shared knowledge base updates must not impact tenant data
Acceptance Criteria: Common data updates complete within 1 hour, zero tenant impact

Requirement: System uptime of 99.5% during business hours
All client data encrypted at rest using AES-256
Acceptance Criteria: Security scan confirming encryption at rest for all DBs

Requirement: All API communications encrypted using TLS 1.3
Acceptance Criteria: SSL Labs test achieving A+ rating

Requirement: Multi-factor authentication required for all users
Acceptance Criteria: MFA enforced for all roles, tested with security audit

Requirement: Client data must be logically or physically separated
Audit logs retained for minimum 7 years (regulatory)
Acceptance Criteria: Audit log retention verified, searchable for 7+ years

Requirement: UI must support consultant workflow with <3 clicks to common tasks
Acceptance Criteria: User testing validates 3-click access to top 10 tasks

Requirement: Code coverage must be minimum 80% for backend services
Acceptance Criteria: SonarQube or Codecov report showing 80%+ coverage

Requirement: Automated backup every 12 hours with 90-day retention
Acceptance Criteria: Backup restoration test successful, RPO < 12 hours

Requirement: Agent Zero API must have <500ms response time for KG queries
